Conversations/Bank/Valen/Museum Lines/di: It seems a bit impractical, but I can imagine a certain someone getting a good deal of use out of it.
I spent my day off at the museum, and got a bit fixated on the $Diamond-backed Mirror$.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Museum Lines/em: I saw that $Emerald-Horned Charger$ at the museum. That prominent, glittering horn of precious stone... what a curious adaptation.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Museum Lines/gi: A $Giant Fish Scale$. Very impressive! Makes you want to see the fish it came from.
I spent my day off at the museum, and wouldn't you know it, there was a new exhibit.
